projects.title: DangoDot - Anime Streaming Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Full Stack Anime Streaming Website made in React
 -  Displays popular or searched Anime from Jikan API
 - Adds/removes anime from watchlist or shows trailer

projects.title: Weather Application
projects.bodyText:
- Full Stack Weather Application made in React
 - Displays weather from OpenWeatherAPI
 - Search a city of choice and it displays information about the current day
